flawed_nl_solution:
The guitar costs $100 every month for 12 months so it costs 100*12 = $<<100*12=1020>>1020
His dad is charging him 10% interest on the $1020 so interest comes to 0.1*1020 = $<<1020*0.1=102>>102
All total, Aaron will owe his father the price of the guitar, $1020 and the interest, $102 so 1020+102 = $<<1020+102=1122>>1122
#### 1122

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1200, not 1020. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
